snippet: The vessel was impounded on Sunday after the crew, armed with what officials called sticks, tried to fend off Panamanian marines investigating whether it was carrying contraband.
abstract: Panama brushes aside North Korea’s demands that it release impounded North Korean freighter and its 35-member crew;  presses criminal charges against all aboard for attempting to transport concealed cargo of Cuban weapons through Panama Canal.
lead_paragraph: The vessel was impounded on Sunday after the crew, armed with what officials called sticks, tried to fend off Panamanian marines investigating whether it was carrying contraband.

headline.main: Panama Charges North Korean Freighter Crew
